name: 身心障礙者休閒行為與生活品質
description: 休閒行為是影響現代人生活品質的重要面向，過去研究也顯示身心障礙者的休閒參與可以增進其生活品質。本課程旨在幫助同學瞭解休閒心理與行為研究的基礎知能用以進行身心障礙者的復健諮商工作，其中包括：休閒與社會心理學、社會學中的幸福感研究與健康促進、社會心理學中的休閒、休閒場域設定與時間、自由與動機、人格與休閒行為、休閒滿意度、休閒效益與休閒阻礙。修習完本課程，同學可對身心障礙者休閒行為與生活品質有一基礎與全面性之理解與實務經驗。
goals: 認識身心障礙者休閒行為與生活品質
認識身心障礙者之休閒心理、動機、阻礙與休閒效益
認識可提高身心障礙者生活品質之休閒產業與專業服務

Week 1.  課程簡介與說明Week 2.  Understanding leisure with social psychologyWeek 3.  Social science and the quest for happiness, health and the good lifeWeek 4.  Social psychology of leisure & Social psychological approach

Week 5.  The social psychology of leisureWeek 6.  Social psychological approaches of leisure studiesWeek 7.  Leisure as behavior, setting and timeWeek 8.  Leisure as a psychological state and experienceWeek 9.  Perceived freedom and intrinsic motivation

Week 10. Personality and leisureWeek 11. Leisure motivation and satisfactionWeek 12. Socialization and the development of leisure orientationsWeek 13. Leisure behavior over the life spanWeek 14. Psychological benefits of leisure: concepts, theories, and evidence

Week 15. The benefits of leisure in other domains of lifeWeek 16. Negotiating leisure constraint and creating leisure affordance

Week 17. Final presentations IWeek 18. Final presentations II

methodologies.note: 專業人士研討、課外閱讀
